content: cactuar in a pot let s see it run away now materials required - 4mm hook ​ - worsted weight yarn in green dark ​ ​ brown and black - yarn needle for sewing - floral / coated wire i used a thick ​ ​ coated wire i got at the hardware store but any medium floral wire will work if it is too thin double strand it - pliers to bend the floral wire ​ ​ - doll stuffing ​ - 3 5 garden pot ​ - piece of scrap cardboard cut in a 3 diameter circle - rocks for weight - black felt - brown pipecleaner - invisible sewing thread us terminology used mc - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet increase - 2 single_crochet in the same st decrease - decrease chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch blo - back loops only fo - fasten_off we will work in rounds mark the beginning of each round with a stitch marker or yarn final fantasy inspired cactuar in a pot body with green round 1 6 single_crochet into mc 6sts round 2 increase in each st 12sts round 3 *single_crochet in next st increase* 6 times 18sts round 4 *single_crochet in next 2 sts increase* 6 times 24sts round 5 *single_crochet in next 3 sts increase* 6 times 30sts round 6 *single_crochet in next 4 sts increase* 6 times 36sts cut at least three 10 long black pieces of yarn if you plan on embroidering the stripes instead of securing them with invisible thread cut longer pieces knot the end of the yarn and using a needle thread them from the inside of your body to the top of the head exiting the center of the mc i only did three stripes down the body and none on the back if you want more stripes add more 10 threads round 7-39 single_crochet around 33 times 36sts stuff body as you go see note on stuffing below round 40 *single_crochet in next 4 sts decrease* 6 times 30sts round 41 *single_crochet in next 3 sts decrease* 6 times 24sts round 42 *single_crochet in next 2 sts decrease* 6 times 18sts round 43 *single_crochet in next st decrease* 6 times 12sts finish stuffing body round 44 *decrease* 6 times 6sts fasten_off threading needle through front loops of last 6 stitches and pulling hole closed arms make two in green round 1 6 single_crochet into a mc 6sts round 2 increase in each st 12sts round 3 *single_crochet in next st increase* 6 times 18 sts round 4-23 *single_crochet around* 20 times round 24 9 single_crochet fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing final fantasy inspired cactuar in a pot legs make two in green round 1 6 single_crochet into a mc 6sts round 2 increase in each st 12sts round 3 *single_crochet in next st increase* 6 times 18 sts round 4-25 *single_crochet around* 22 times round 26 9 single_crochet fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing note
